name: Enlightening Love
description:
A lovely story about a little candle losing its mom and trying to save her..

You have a short amout of time to remember a layout of a level and then have to complete it fast enough, so your candle doesn't burn out.  

This is my first ever game and was completed in one week. 

List of people who worked on this game:

  • Main developer - Plat
  • Little helper - Ruft
  • Wouldn't be possible without - Doctor Greenspoon
